EmailTemplate.name: Rejection Email Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!TASKRAY__Project__c.Name} External Vendor Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Preferred_Vendor_Request__c.CreatedBy},
Your request for the following preferred vendor and project has been rejected.
To view the Request Form, please click here. https://cs65.salesforce.com/{!Preferred_Vendor_Request__c.Id}
Please contact your supervisor for any questions you may have involving this request.
Thank you.
